job_details.degree_required: 4-yr Technical Degree (CS, MIS, CIS or equivalent)

jd: From: Shubhra Soni, Sonitalent shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Hi, Hope you are doing well,We are looking for Data Engineer if you are interested kindly send me your updated resume.Job Title: Data Engineer Location: Irvine, CA ( Onsite ) Local only Duration: 6+ months Interview: Phone/ Skype-2Rounds Linkedin Must have Job Description:Must Haves:* 4-yr Technical Degree (CS, MIS, CIS or equivalent)* 6+ yrs of Data Management (Data Warehouse, Data Integration, Data Modeling, and Business Intelligence technologies)* 3+ yrs of SQL and Python* 2+ yrs of Matillion and SSI- PLEASE SCREEN FOR HANDS-ON XP* 1+yrs Snowflake* 2+ yrs of Source Control (Bitbucket/Git/Github) Thanks & RegardShubhra SoniTechnical Recruiter| Sonitalent Corp.Email id : shubhra.soni@sonitalentcorp.com Desk | (859) 659 - 3432 EXT 211Address - 5404 Merri brook Lane, Prospect, KY, USA
